p: In addition to self-limiting HFMD or herpangina, EV-A71 is also rarely associated with more severe neurological diseases such as encephalitis, meningitis, acute flaccid paralysis and neurogenic pulmonary edema [ 6, 7]. Since its first isolation in California in 1969, numerous epidemics of EV-A71 have been reported, mainly in Asia, including Singapore [ 8, 9], Malaysia [ 10, 11], Taiwan [ 12, 13] and mainland China [ 14, 15].
